user_instruction: 'Send out a group email with the latest updates on our office environment and workflow changes. You can check out my Gmail and NotionManager for information.'

formatted_items.arguments:
{"to":["all-staff@company.com"],"subject":"Office Environment & Workflow Updates","body":"Hi team,

Here are the latest updates on our office environment and current workflows:

1. Office Renovation
• Renovation work on the ground floor (including the common work areas and break room) is scheduled to start soon. 
• During this period, all teams currently seated on the ground floor will temporarily relocate to the upper floors. Facilities will provide desk assignments and moving crates shortly.
• We expect limited access to ground-floor amenities while work is underway. Thank you in advance for your flexibility.

2. Project Phoenix & Project Quantum
• Project Phoenix has wrapped up its most recent sprint ahead of plan and will begin the next phase shortly. Kudos to everyone involved!
• Project Quantum has encountered a few technical hurdles; additional resources have been allocated and the team is preparing a recovery path to bring the timeline back on track.
• If your work depends on either project, please coordinate with the respective project leads for updated milestones.

Questions?
• For renovation logistics, reach out to Facilities.
• For workflow or timeline matters, contact the PMO team.

Thank you for your cooperation and continued hard work.

Best regards,
[Your Name]
[Your Role]"}

formatted_items.content: Your group update has been sent to all staff. Let me know if you’d like any adjustments or follow-ups!

final_output: Your group update has been sent to all staff. Let me know if you’d like any adjustments or follow-ups!
